patterns: Tell me about PCIkng
What is PCIkng?
Where is PCIkng located?
When was PCIkng established?
Give me some details about PCIkng
responses: PCIkng, established in 1951, is a leading educational institution affiliated with the State Council of Technical Education, West Bengal. We offer government-certified courses in computer and technology. Our location: 32/2 Mon Mohan Ghosh Street, Krishnagar, Nadia, West Bengal. Learn more: [About PCIkng](https://www.pcikng.org/about-us/).

patterns: How can I contact PCIkng?
What is the phone number for PCIkng?
What is your email address?
How do I get in touch?
Where can I find your contact information?
responses: You can contact us via phone at +91 7407378478, +91 9933115723, or +91 9333285727. Our email addresses are admission@pcikng.org, feedback@pcikng.org, jobapply@pcikng.org, and support@pcikng.org. Office hours are 10 AM to 10 PM. Location details: [PCIkng on Google Maps](https://www.google.com/maps?ll=23.409237,88.493179&z=17&t=m&hl=en-US&gl=US&mapclient=embed&q=Manmohan+Ghosh+Street+Behind+Government+College+Bus+Stop,+Krishnanagar,+West+Bengal).

patterns: What are the holidays?
When is the next holiday?
What is the holiday schedule?
Tell me about the holiday calendar?
Which holidays are coming up?
responses:
Our upcoming holidays include:

- Christmas Eve (24 Dec)
- Christmas (25 Dec)
- Guru Govind Singh Jayanti (29 Dec)

patterns: Tell me about Desktop Publishing Operator and Multimedia
What is DPOM?
Details for Desktop Publishing course
Can you explain Desktop Publishing and its applications?
What does a Desktop Publishing Operator do?
responses: The Desktop Publishing Operator and Multimedia (DPOM) course is a 6-month program with fees of ₳500/month. Eligibility: Class 8 Pass. Job roles include DTP Operator and Multimedia Assistant. Total training hours: 600. Learn more: [DPOM Details](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZujLZBlBuH4ncYulFVmNqdbeOSV2gICx/view). Apply here: [Apply for DPOM](https://www.pcikng.org/membership/).

patterns: Tell me about Accounting Associate course
What is ACAS?
Details for Accounting course
Can you explain what an Accounting Associate does?
What are the requirements for the Accounting Associate course?
responses: The Accounting Associate (ACAS) course is a 6-month program with fees of ₳500/month. Eligibility: Class 8 Pass. Job roles include Accounting Assistant and Finance & Accounts. Total training hours: 600. Learn more: [ACAS Details](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SVUJMYGkE2KIUaZNsLwP_z2-qDNRc1HL/view). Apply here: [Apply for ACAS](https://www.pcikng.org/membership/).

patterns: Tell me about Data Entry Operator course
What is DEDP?
Details for Data Entry Operator program
Can you provide information on Data Entry Operator training?
What does the Data Entry Operator program include?
responses: The Data Entry Operator with Introduction to Desktop Publishing (DEDP) course is a 6-month program with fees of ₳500/month. Eligibility: Class 8 Pass. Job roles include Data Entry Operator and DTP Assistant. Total training hours: 600. Learn more: [DEDP Details](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dmuo0eS9rZGD7TSwij5Uc9cQJMn7PhM8/view). Apply here: [Apply for DEDP](https://www.pcikng.org/membership/).

patterns: Tell me about Computer Application course
What is CACP?
Details for Computer Application program
Can you explain the Computer Application course?
What is the Computer Application program?
responses: The Computer Application and Basics of 'C' & Python Programming (CACP) course is a 1-year program with fees of ₳500/month. Eligibility: Class 8 Pass + ITI or equivalent. Job roles include Programming Assistant and Network Support. Total training hours: 1200. Learn more: [CACP Details](https://drive.google.com/file/d/18Gvl1pwTeSQiP7lna84WCv5lwzyy-KfI/view). Apply here: [Apply for CACP](https://www.pcikng.org/membership/).

patterns: Tell me about Web Designing and Development
What is included in Web Designing?
Details for Web Development program
What does a web designer do?
Can you explain the process of web development?
responses: The Web Designing and Development course includes technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Python, PHP, and MySQL. Fees: ₹500 each for frontend and backend. Learn more: [Web Designing Details](https://www.pcikng.org/web-designing-and-development/).

patterns: What services do you provide?
Tell me about the services offered
What can I expect from PCIkng?
Can you list the services you offer?
What are the services available at PCIkng?
responses:
At PCIkng, we provide:
- CERTIFIED COURSES: Recognized and industry-relevant.
- CERTIFIED TEACHERS: Skilled educators with professional credentials.
- TOP CLASSES & MATERIALS: Comprehensive learning resources and expert-led sessions.

patterns: What courses do you offer?
Tell me about the available courses
List the courses you provide
Can you share the courses available?
What programs do you offer?
responses:
We offer the following courses:

1. Desktop Publishing Operator And Multimedia (DPOM), for more details [click here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZujLZBlBuH4ncYulFVmNqdbeOSV2gICx/view) or [Apply now](https://www.pcikng.org/membership/)

2. Accounting Associate (ACAS), for more details [click here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SVUJMYGkE2KIUaZNsLwP_z2-qDNRc1HL/view) or [Apply now](https://www.pcikng.org/membership/)

3.Data Entry Operator with the Introduction of Desktop Publishing (DEDP), for more details [click here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dmuo0eS9rZGD7TSwij5Uc9cQJMn7PhM8/view) or [Apply now](https://www.pcikng.org/membership/)

4. Computer Application and Basics of ‘C’ & Python Programming (CACP), for more details [click here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/18Gvl1pwTeSQiP7lna84WCv5lwzyy-KfI/view) or [Apply now](https://www.pcikng.org/membership/)

responses:

-CorelDRAW
- Tally
- Photoshop
